entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow and blowing snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
